article_title: White House Tracking HealthCare.gov Performance With Real-time Analytics
article_text: Marketing, which is highly quantitative, targeted, and tied to business outcomes, will likely become highly automated by 2025, says Tom Davenport, a senior advisor with Deloitte Analytics. The few people who will comprise the marketing team of the future will be responsible for ensuring that promotions are creative and for overseeing the automated systems.

twitter.description: HealthCare.gov includes Web analytics software from New Relic to track the insurance exchange’s performance in real-time, a key tool in the organization’s mission to find issues hamper users of the website.
twitter.title: White House Tracking HealthCare.gov Performance With Real-time Analytics

article_summary:
The few people who will comprise the marketing team of the future will be responsible for ensuring that promotions are creative and for overseeing the automated systems.
Marketing, which is highly quantitative, targeted, and tied to business outcomes, will likely become highly automated by 2025, says Tom Davenport, a senior advisor with Deloitte Analytics.
